Sequence Information.Family: Belongs to the 2S seed storage albumins family
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Fungi:Trichoderma harzianum (IC50=32 µg/ml), Fusarium oxysporum (IC50=34 µg/ml), Aspergillus fumigatus (IC50=40 µg/ml).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Tissue specificity: Expressed in seed (at protein level). Not detected in pulp, stems and leaves.

Literature.Title: An antifungal peptide from passion fruit (Passiflora edulis) seeds with similarities to 2S albumin proteins.
Literature.Author: Pelegrini PB, Noronha EF, Muniz MA, Vasconcelos IM, Chiarello MD, Oliveira JT, Franco OL.
